title: Academic Research Form
description: Collect data for academic research studies

intro.title: Research Study Participation
intro.description: Thank you for your interest in participating in our academic research study. This form collects basic information to determine your eligibility and to contact you with further details if you qualify.

education_level.title: Education Level
education_level.description: Please select your highest level of education completed

research_topics.title: Research Topics of Interest
research_topics.description: Please select all research topics you would be interested in participating in

availability.title: Availability
availability.description: Please select all times you would be available to participate in research studies

participation_method.title: Preferred Participation Methods
participation_method.description: Please select all methods of participation you would be comfortable with

previous_participation.title: Previous Research Participation
previous_participation.description: Have you participated in academic research studies before?

how_heard.title: How did you hear about this research opportunity?
how_heard.description: Please select how you heard about this research study

additional_comments.title: Additional Comments
additional_comments.description: Please provide any additional information that might be relevant to your participation

consent.title: Consent to Participate
consent.description: I understand the purpose of this research and consent to be contacted for potential participation in research studies. I understand that I can withdraw my consent at any time.

data_usage.title: Data Usage Agreement
data_usage.description: I agree that the information provided in this form may be used for research purposes in accordance with the privacy policy and ethical guidelines of the research institution.

contact_permission.title: Future Contact
contact_permission.description: I agree to be contacted about future research studies that may be relevant to my profile.

thank_you.title: Thank You!
thank_you.description: Thank you for your interest in participating in our research. If you qualify for any current or upcoming studies, a researcher will contact you with more information.
